channel.title: A smarter npc handler version 1
channel.description:
As always ive though of ways to be better than the rest of ya with npcs and i think this is probly one of my simplest yet most effective creations the pictures more or less explain themselives but as you see certain npcs spawn on certain triggers in this example i did a day night trigger
[img]http://upload-image.com/image/x2M01859.png[/img] [img]http://upload-image.com/image/e2101781.png[/img]
version 2 i plan to have an option to remove npcs on trigger as well[br][size=1]Posted at: August 02, 2006, 02:57:47 AM[/size][hr]woot version 2 is complete i can now delete enitre sets of npcs on a tigg
